official_title: A bill to establish in the Department of Education an Office of Correctional Education, and for other purposes.
short_title: Office of Correctional Education Act of 1989

summary.text: Office of Correctional Education Act of 1989 - Amends the Department of Education Organization Act to direct the Secretary of Education to establish within the Department of Education an Office of Correctional Education.

titles.title: Office of Correctional Education Act of 1989
A bill to establish in the Department of Education an Office of Correctional Education, and for other purposes.
